articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kangdong Precision Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kangdong Precision Machine Plant
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Kangdong Precision Machine Plant.
					 He went round various parts of the plant, including the newly-built products exhibition hall and processing shop, to learn in detail about its production and updating and the quality of products.
					
					 He said that the exhibition hall has been built as a splendid structure and that he likes everything displayed there as varieties of exhibits look nice, easy to operate and very efficient, adding that precision machine processing technology is at the world-level.
					
					 He looked round the newly-built room for disseminating science and technology.
					
					 An effective use of the room is an important work to thoroughly implement the Party's policy of making all the people well versed in science and technology, he said, stressing the need for the employees to make it part of their everyday life to acquire the knowledge of cutting-edge science and technology so that they may steadily improve their technical skills and broaden their outlooks and thus become personnel possessed of modern science and technology.
					
					 He toured the bean processing factory, Ponghwa Health Complex and dwelling houses.
					
					 It is good to turn out varieties of soy bean-based products after building bean sprouts processing factory, bean curd processing factory, etc., he noted.
					
					 He said he was pleased with everything at the health complex having bath facilities, swimming pool, barber's, beauty parlor, table tennis room, gym-cum clinic, dining room, etc. It has been built in such a way that it looks bright, cozy and comfortable, he noted, adding that it was a good idea that the ceiling was built with glass. He was very pleased that the employees of the plant and their families have become able to lead a cultured life like urban people.
					
					 Saying that employees of the plant would like the dwelling houses built in an impeccable style and fitted with quality and attractive furniture, he told officials to let settlers move to new houses on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Appreciating high enthusiasm of the workers at the plant to boost the production, he set forth tasks facing the plant.
					
					 He had a photo session with the officials and employees of the plant.
					
					 Accompanying him were Jo Yong Won and Yu Jin, vice department directors of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Feb. 5.
					 Congratulating Kim Jong Un on the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the message wished him good health and his family happiness and the friendly Korean people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Members of Chinese Embassy Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Members of Chinese Embassy Held
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK foreign ministry hosted a friendly meeting with staff members of the Chinese embassy here on Tuesday on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Present at the meeting on invitation were Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers said that the DPRK-China friendship is a valuable asset provided and developed by the preceding leaders of the two countries.
					
					 They expressed their will to make common efforts to steadily develop the bilateral friendly relations despite the complicated international situation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Development of KPRA into Regular Revolutionary Armed Forces Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Development of KPRA into Regular Revolutionary Armed Forces Marked
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on Feb. 7 to mark the 69th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's development of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) into the regular revolutionary armed forces.
					 The meeting was attended by Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA Vice Marshal Ri Myong Su, chief of the KPA General Staff, Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and other KPA commanding officers and service personnel.
					
					 Hwang made a report.
					
					 He said that the development of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular revolutionary armed forces was a brilliant victory of the idea and line of building the regular armed forces set forth by the President on the basis of the immortal Juche idea and Songun idea.
					
					 He noted that leader Kim Jong Il set forth it as the general task of building the army to model the whole army on Kimilsungism, and strengthened the People's Army into the perfect army of the leader and the Party.
					
					 Respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un has firmly defended the feats of the peerlessly great men in building the army and added luster to them through his energetic leadership with the firm will to make the People's Army the eternal army of the President and Kim Jong Il, the reporter said.
					
					 He called for vigorously bolstering up the military muscle under the unfurled banner of modeling the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un and thus building a powerful socialist country, reunified and prosperous, on the land as desired by the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He also said that the KPA would keep highly alert under the prevailing situation and that if the enemies dare violate the sovereignty and dignity of the country even a bit, the KPA will wipe out the strongholds of aggression through merciless preemptive strikes of Korean style and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: Film Show Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Film Show Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A film show was given Tuesday at the Taedongmun Cinema in the run-up to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Invited to the show were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and officials of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Among the audience were officials concerned and creators and artistes in the field of cinematic art.
					
					 They watched the Korean documentary film "Prospering Pyongyang."

articles.title: Meetings with War Heroes Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Meetings with War Heroes Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Working people's organizations of the DPRK held meetings with heroes on Tuesday to observe the historic day February 8, Juche 37 (1948) when President Kim Il Sung developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into regular armed forces under the independent line of army building after Korea's liberation.
					 Workers and members of trade unions met with DPRK Hero Kim Sung Un, a lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, at the Central Hall of Workers.
					
					 Kim recalled that Kim Il Sung initiated the aircraft-hunting team movement during the Fatherland Liberation War and taught soldiers of the Korean People's Army good methods of hunting enemy aircraft, encouraging them to perform feats.
					
					 He said he was honored to receive the title of DPRK Hero for shooting down five enemy aircraft in 20 odd days through the movement.
					
					 Agricultural workers and members of the agricultural workers union met with DPRK Hero Pak In Ho, a lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, at the Phungjong Co-op Farm in Jungsan County of South Phyongan Province.
					
					 Pak told that KPA soldiers captured in just 14 minutes the U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo engrossed in arrogant espionage and its crewmen. 
					
					 At the meeting with officials and members of the women's union in the Hall of Women, Labor Hero Jon Ku Gang, a lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, told how she grew up to be an army surgeon from a girl student and worked to save lives of soldiers during the war.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Scheme to Stifle Democratic National Education of Korean Residents Condemned
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Scheme to Stifle Democratic National Education of Korean Residents Condemned
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of Korea Monday issued a statement condemning the Japanese authorities for their base political suppression and inhumane actions to violate the democratic national rights of Korean residents in Japan.
					 According to the statement, the Osaka District Court of Japan on Jan. 26 made a decision of turning down the suit filed by the Osaka Korean School, one of the institutions for national education of Korean residents in Japan, in September 2012 in defense of the Korean residents' right to democratic national education.
					
					 As far as the suit is concerned, it reflected the just voices of the above-said institution and all the Korean residents in Japan rejecting the unjust decision made by the Osaka Prefecture and Osaka City authorities in March 2012 to unilaterally suspend the payment of subsidies for education which had been made since 1974.
					
					 The court's unjust decision reveals Japan's persistent chauvinist policy and vicious hostile policy towards the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Japan has moral and legal responsibility to guarantee the rights of Korean residents to national education in the light of the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past and its domestic law.
					
					 However, the Japanese reactionaries have desperately worked to suppress and stamp out Koreans' national education out of their extreme evil intention and political prejudices.
					
					 Even at this moment, violence and threat to obliterate the said education of the Korean residents are occurring in an unbroken chain and all sorts of pressure and blackmail against the Korean schools are now being perpetrated in a more sinister and cunning way in Japan where the ultra-rightist conservative forces are ruling the roost.
					
					 The right to national education is an important issue related to the human rights of the Korean residents in Japan, and it is a blatant challenge to international justice to violate this right.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop at once the nasty and vicious actions to abuse the issue of national education of the Koreans in Japan  as a political and diplomatic bargaining before painting their country as a "law-governed state", the statement urged.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Check Democratic National Education of Koreans in Japan Slammed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Check Democratic National Education of Koreans in Japan Slammed
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Jurists Committee released a statement Tuesday to denounce the Japanese reactionaries for desperately moving to check the democratic national education of Koreans in Japan in the new year.
					 The Osaka District Court of Japan on Jan. 26 justified a step taken by the local administrative authorities which excluded Osaka Korean School from the list of subsidies for education, and passed an absurd decision of declining the just demand raised by the school side.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the Japanese reactionaries in stretching their dark tentacles even to the inviolable national education, not content with their sanctions moves against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The aim is to check subsidies to the Korean schools, put financial burden and, furthermore, mental stress on parents of Korean children and thus get them away from the fold of the DPRK and Chongryon. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities are legally and morally obliged to provide the Koreans in Japan with the right to national education in the light of the crimes Japan committed against the Korean people in the past and in the light of the Japanese law.
					
					 The recent decision made by the Osaka District Court is an unethical crime against humanitarianism, quite contrary to the international convention on human rights on ensuring foreigners equal right to education.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' persistent moves to deprive Koreans in Japan of their right to national education remind one of the cursed crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past who went desperate to deprive Koreans of their written and spoken language and even names, out of their ambition to exterminate the Korean nation.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries consider Chongryon as a thorn in their flesh, and even seek to prevent Koreans in Japan from receiving inviolable national education. These despicable moves only harden the hatred of Koreans toward Japan, sworn enemy, and the will to take merciless retaliation.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have to immediately stop unwarranted discrimination against national education of Koreans in Japan and will be made to hold full responsibility for ensuing consequences.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees, Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees, Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were conferred on intellectuals on the occasion of leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary.
					 The title of candidate academician went to Ri Myong Gwon, head of a department of Kim Man Yu Hospital, and others.
					
					 Professorship was conferred upon some persons, including Kang Ki Chan, vice-dean of a faculty of Kim Il Sung University, Hyon Song Chol, head of a department of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Ryong Sung, deputy rector of University of Sciences, Ho Kwang Chun, head of the Bioengineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 Doctorate went to An Ung Nam, head of a department of Kim Il Sung University, Ri Chol Jin, dean of a faculty of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Choe Yong Guk, head of a department of University of National Economy, Ri Jong Su, a teacher of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Son Kwang Il, head of a department of Pyongyang University of Architecture, and others, the title of associate professor to 160 persons and master's degrees to 780 persons.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place on Tuesday.

articles.title: Anniversary of Fireproof Materials Institute Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Anniversary of Fireproof Materials Institute Marked in DPRK
Tanchon, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Fireproof Materials Institute under the General Bureau of the Tanchon Area Mining Industry in the DPRK marked the 50th anniversary of its foundation.
					 President Kim Il Sung mapped out a scheme to develop the magnesia clinker industry by comprehensively using magnesite largely deposited in Tanchon area and established a scientific institute specializing in research into fireproof materials on February 8, Juche 56 (1967), setting forth the tasks to be carried out by it.
					
					 On May 20, 2009 when visiting the Taehung Youth Hero Mine, leader Kim Jong Il highly appreciated the workers and scientists of the institute who accomplished the Juche-oriented production of magnesite clinker based on local fuel, and encouraged them to work greater feats.
					
					 Over the past 50 years, the institute has made big contributions to the development of the country's magnesia clinker industry and the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					 A meeting took place on Tuesday to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the institute.
					
					 Conveyed at the meeting was a congratulatory message of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to the scientists and employees of the institute.

articles.title: Schoolchildren Tours Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site, Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 1
articles.content:
Schoolchildren Tours Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site, Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 1
Samjiyon, February 7 (KCNA) -- School youth and children from across the country making study tour of leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp visited the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site and the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 1.
					 They began their study tour of the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site on February 6.
					
					 At the Samjiyon Grand Monument, they laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.
					
					 They went round the shore of Lake Samji, a torch tower, groups of subsidiary theme sculptures and other places.
					
					 They placed a floral basket and bouquets at the statue of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il in Samjiyon County and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Then they toured different places in the town of Samjiyon, including Samtogong log cabin where Kim Jong Il spent a night with members of the expedition group in June of Juche 45 (1956) when paving the way for the study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in Paektusan area.
					
					 They enjoyed a performance given by members of art group at the Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace.
					
					 They also visited the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 1 on Tuesday. 
					
					 They toured the dam of the power station, product of hard work of the youth shock brigade members, and the Paektusan Hero Youth Exploits Exhibition Hall.

articles.title: Magic Arts under Rapid Development in DPRK
articles.content:
Magic Arts under Rapid Development in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Magic performance is being given by the National Circus in Pyongyang, enjoying great popularity.
					 Put on the stage are diverse numbers like illusionary jugglery "Motorcycle Tricks" and functional jugglery "Producing Pigeons."
					
					 The development of magic arts in the DPRK would have been unthinkable without the guidance of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il saw scores of magic performances, indicated in detail the orientation and ways for developing magic arts and solved all the problems arising in it.
					
					 As a result, a number of jugglery pieces have been created and some of them were highly appreciated at different world magic festivals.
					
					 Now, the magic arts is making a rapid progress under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A well-organized educational system for training reserve magicians was further completed. Pyongyang Acrobatic School has sent its graduates to each province to develop the magic arts.
					
					 The National Circus strives to create new jugglery pieces with world competitiveness.
					
					 Meanwhile, it is gaining momentum in the country to disseminate simple juggleries.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Nampho, February 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen Tuesday met at Nampho Port of the DPRK to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting attended by captains and crewmen of Panamanian-flagged ship Kaixiang, Jamaican-flagged ship New Global and a Fijian-flagged ship.
					
					 Speakers noted that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power, a satellite manufacturing and launching state and a nuclear weapons state and led the cause of global independence to victory.
					
					 They stressed that he is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives for his immortal exploits for the country and the people and the times and history.
					
					 They said with high appreciation that the DPRK has more strikingly displayed its dignity and strength before the world under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is creditably carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would register bigger success in their struggle for national reunification and building of a socialist power.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Founding Korean People's Army (2)
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Founding Korean People's Army (2)
Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division
					
					 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- After founding the Korean People's Army (KPA), President Kim Il Sung exerted great efforts to organize powerful tank forces and expand them.
					
					 He took measures to train core elements and even gave precious instructions on building a tank base and acquiring tank skill on the spot.
					
					 Under his care, sons of workers and peasants, who suffered humiliation and insult before the liberation of the country, were trained as tankmen in a little more than few months and the first tank unit came into being in August Juche 37 (1948).
					
					 The Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division, the origin of the DPRK's tank forces, performed heroic feats during the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953).
					
					 The division advanced into Seoul three days after the start of the war, hoisted the DPRK's flag atop the puppet Capital Building and occupied the Seoul broadcasting station to declare the liberation of Seoul.
					
					 It killed or injured tens of thousands of enemies in different combats, including the combat to liberate Taejon and destroyed hundreds pieces of ordnances, tanks, armored cars and other combat equipment, producing tens of the DPRK heroes and a number of order-bearers.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il started his Songun (military-first) revolutionary leadership with the inspection of the division on Aug. 25, 1960.
					
					 He inspected the unit on several occasions and said that the division is a guards unit powerful in battle and strong in ideological aspect.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA, visited the unit on Jan. 1, 2012, declaring his steadfast will to accomplish the cause of Songun revolution pioneered and led by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division is a pride of the heroic KPA as it has taken the lead in safeguarding the Workers' Party of Korea and the leaders in the grim annals of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Founding Korean People's Army (3)
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Founding Korean People's Army (3)
Powerful Artillery, Main Striking Force of KPA
					
					 Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The artillery is a main striking force of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Thanks to the outstanding leadership of the peerlessly great persons, the artillery could be developed into a powerful militant rank of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 After country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule on August 15, 1945, President Kim Il Sung laid a foundation for building an artillery force, established an integral system of training artillery commanding officers and personally took measures to set up an artillery training center in December, 1945.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), he created unique artillery tactics suited to the terrain condition of the country, thus dealing annihilating blows to aggressors with intensive artillery strikes. 
					
					 After the war, he put forward the strengthening of the artillery as one of main tasks to modernize the entire army and set forth the Juche-oriented artillery training methods and tactics.
					
					 True to Kim Il Sung's idea of giving importance to the artillery, leader Kim Jong Il opened up a new golden age of the artillery development.
					
					 In the days of Songun (military-first) revolutionary leadership, Kim Jong Il inspected many military units to reinforce the power of the KPA artillery.
					
					 The might of the KPA artillery attains the highest stage of its development under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 All the artillery units and sub-units are always combat-ready and a movement for becoming crack-shots prevails in the whole army. 
					
					 Through different firing drills like the fire drill of ballistic rockets by Hwasong artillery units of the KPA Strategic Force, a firing contest among women multiple launch rocket system gunners selected from the large combined units of the KPA, an intensive artillery striking drill of KPA artillery units on the front, a firing contest among multiple launch rocket system batteries selected from large combined units of the KPA conducted under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, all the artillerymen have been trained into master-hands at artillery warfare and crack-shots.

articles.title: Nukes of Aggression Generate Access to Nuclear Weapons of Justice: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Nukes of Aggression Generate Access to Nuclear Weapons of Justice: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- 59 years has passed since the U.S. shipped nuclear weapons into south Korea.
					 The U.S. officially announced on Jan. 29, 1958 that it deployed Honest John nuclear missiles in south Korea and opened to public the deployed nuclear weapons in February that year.
					
					 Since then, it has systematically increased the number of nuclear weapons in south Korea over the past nearly 60 years, reaching more than 1,000 in the 1970s and more than 1720 in the 1990s.
					
					 The U.S. nukes deployed in south Korea are means of aggression and domination to stifle the DPRK and conquer the whole world from A to Z.
					
					 A long time ago, the U.S. shaped the policy of pressurizing the DPRK to the effect that it will use nuclear weapons if the second Korean war breaks out, claiming that it was defeated in the Korean War because it did not use A-bomb.
					
					 Pursuant to the policy, it declared the start of equipping its forces present in south Korea with nukes in July 1957 and stepped up the forward deployment of nuclear weapons and thus turned south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East.
					
					 It set the DPRK as a target of its preemptive nuclear attack and has modified and supplemented the scenarios for a nuclear war against the DPRK time and again and made them more criminal in their contents and has ceaselessly developed them through anti-DPRK war drills with the puppet forces every year.
					
					 Shortly ago, the U.S. promised the south Korean puppet forces that it would stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises targeting the DPRK in the largest scale.
					
					 It is the mastermind of a nuclear war hell-bent on imposing a nuclear disaster upon the Korean nation and an arch criminal that spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The daily-escalating U.S. nuclear pressure on the DPRK compelled the latter to counter the nukes with its own nukes as its last option and have access to even the ultra-modern strategic strike means such as smaller, lighter and diversified nuclear warheads as well as H-bomb.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons markedly reduced the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and replaced the era of nukes of aggression, in which the U.S. unilaterally posed nuclear threat, with an era of nukes of justice in which the hostile forces can never have a sound sleep.
					
					 A report, submitted to U.S. Congress on February 1, defined the DPRK as the country that topped the "nightmare" list of the U.S. and warned that the DPRK's measure of bolstering its nuclear force would drive the Trump administration to the most critical phase that has never been faced by its predecessors.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is the most justifiable option for saving the destiny of the country and nation and defending peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the region.
					
					 The correct answer to the question how to remove the nuclear threat to the DPRK is the access to powerful nuclear deterrence only.
					
					 The DPRK will steadily bolster up its military capability for self-defence with nuclear weapons as a pivot and capability for a preemptive strike, as long as the U.S. and its vassal forces continue to seek nuclear threat and blackmail against it and conduct nuclear war drills at its doorstep under the pretext of annual ones.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group would be well advised to behave themselves, clearly aware of who their opponent is and facing up to the trend of the times.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Abduction of DPRK Women Citizens
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Abduction of DPRK Women Citizens
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, a spokesman for the puppet unification ministry of south Korea let loose a spate of impudent excuses that it has refrained from opening to public the fate of women citizens of the DPRK, who were allured and abducted to south Korea, "at their own request."
					 With no rhetoric the Park Geun Hye group can cover up the above-said crime, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary says, adding:
					
					 As the puppet authorities are refusing to open the fate of the abductees to public after keeping them in custody, there is a rumor in south Korea that they might have been mercilessly killed.
					
					 This cannot be overlooked in the light of the inveterate inhumanity and cruelty of Part Geun Hye and her group, confrontational maniacs without equals. 
					
					 Precisely for this reason, growing stronger not only in south Korea but in international arena are the voices demanding the repatriation of the abductees.
					
					 What matters is that the puppet group is prodding such anti-DPRK human rights bodies as the "center for recording human rights in the north" and the "foundation of human rights in the north" into confrontation rackets, far from complying with the above-said just demand.
					
					 There is no statute of limitation to the crimes against humanity.
					
					 The puppet authorities should be mindful that their evermore persistent delaying tactics to cover up their allurement and abduction of those women and block their repatriation would only add to their crimes and compel them to pay dearer price.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Japanese Militarists Obsessed with Overseas Expansion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Japanese Militarists Obsessed with Overseas Expansion
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Japan is accelerating joint research for the new type air-to-air missile for a fighter with Britain for the first time after the cancellation of the measure of banning arms export. Meanwhile, it concluded a military agreement with Britain at which it agreed on mutual support of materials such as ammunition. It already concluded similar agreements with the U.S. and Australia and is stepping up the plan for updating them in line with the security legislation. It is also under negotiations for concluding agreements with Canada and France.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says that Japan is getting more undisguised in reviving militarism.
					
					 Japan is no longer a "pacifist state", the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries who are proud of their economic power and ultra-modern technology are acting recklessly, obsessed with reinvasion hysteria.
					
					 The exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" allows them to dispatch their forces to anywhere anytime, being pursuant to the U.S. instruction.
					
					 Long ago, they changed their early military strategy in which the operational sphere of the "Self-Defense Forces" was limited to the air and sea of Japan pursuant to their strategy of "exclusive defense".
					
					 Under the revised "Japan-U.S. Defence Cooperation Guidelines", the operational sphere of the SDF has expanded to the world.
					
					 Under the U.S. positive patronage, the Japanese reactionaries can openly take part in a war for dominating the world, away from a war criminal state.
					
					 Japan's moves for reinvasion are inching close to the fire line.
					
					 However, the Japanese reactionaries are miscalculating, obsessed with overseas invasion.
					
					 They should clearly understand that the final station for their militarist train is the one of self-ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. and S. Korea Originators of Nuclear Issue
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. and S. Korea Originators of Nuclear Issue
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces talk volumes about the "nuclear threat from the north" and "impossibility of settling any issue before denuclearization of the north" after the appearance of the new administration in the U.S. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula by ceaselessly posing nuclear threat and blackmail to the DPRK and have blocked the settlement of the issue.
					
					 Every year the U.S. introduces huge nuclear strategic assets including nuclear strategic bomber and nuclear-powered carrier into south Korea and frantically stages joint military drills threatening the DPRK under the pretext of coping with "threat" from someone.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces in collusion with the U.S. have staged nuclear war drills against the north. Not content with this, they decided to introduce THAAD into south Korea, mapped out very dangerous plans for a nuclear war such as "active deterrence strategy," "4D operation plan" and "strategy for large-scale counteraction" and run amuck to implement those scenarios, driving the situation of the Korean peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 The U.S. massively introduced all kinds of nuclear weapons and hardware for a nuclear war into south Korea to turn it into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the world and it has posed unheard-of nuclear threat and blackmail to the DPRK, while ceaselessly waging provocative nuclear war drills for invading the north. Yet, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are shameless enough to vociferate about the "nuclear threat" from someone.
					
					 They can never cover up their brutal nature as heinous criminals making desperate efforts to impose disaster of a nuclear war upon the Korean nation after turning south Korea into the most dangerous advanced base for a nuclear war against the north.

articles.title: Minju Joson Hits out at S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Hits out at S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A few days ago, Hong Yong Phyo, south Korean minister of Unification, appeared at a "gathering of homesick people" held at Rimjin Pavilion and groundlessly took issue with the DPRK, crying out for the "settlement" of the issue of divided families and relatives. And he said that they would lead the north to "denuclearization and change" in cooperation with the international community.
					 Earlier, Hong talked rubbish about the "unification of social systems", jabbering that "it is hard to settle the denuclearization without change of the north" and "its nuclear issue must be viewed as a unification issue" while zealously supporting Park Geun Hye's policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen at a recent "plenary meeting of the ministry's policy advisory committee".
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson on Tuesday says:
					
					 Traitor Hong's heinous confrontational remarks are an intolerable anti-national, anti-reunification act of throwing a wet blanket over the desire for the reunification of the Korean nation determined to improve the north-south relations and open up a broad avenue to independent reunification by bringing a pan-national reunification conference to success.
					
					 The north-south relations entered the worst phase of catastrophe and the Kaesong Industrial Zone was shut down. This is ascribable to the despicable deed of the gentry at the south Korean ministry of Unification, including Hong Yong Phyo who took the lead in escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen under the directives of Park Geun Hye who followed the words of Choe Sun Sil that the "DPRK will collapse and reunification will come in 2017 or 2018 at the latest".
					
					 No matter how desperately Hong, destined to go to hell together with Park, may try, there will no longer be a way out.
					
					 He is well advised to get himself ready for trial by history, clearly mindful that his reckless confrontational hysteria will hasten his own destruction.

articles.title: Lotte Group Accused of Trying to Offer Site for THAAD
articles.content:
Lotte Group Accused of Trying to Offer Site for THAAD
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo, organizations such as the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 3 to denounce the Lotte Group for mulling offering the site for the deployment of THAAD.
					 At the conference speakers referred to the fact that that day the Lotte Group held a directors' meeting to formally discuss the issue of offering Songju Golf Course as the site for the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 They said that there is doubt as to whether the "government" did not pressure the group to make a fait accompli the deployment of THAAD timed to coincide with the U.S. defense secretary's south Korean junket.
					
					 They stressed that the group's offering of the site will be considered as bribery.
					
					 On the same day the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment and other organizations of south Korea issued a joint statement in protest of the deployment of THAAD.

articles.title: 100th Day of Candlelight Action Observed in S. Korea
articles.content:
100th Day of Candlelight Action Observed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore carried an editorial titled "100 days of candlelight action, spring has not come yet".
					 The editorial noted that one hundred days have passed since the candlelight action started in south Korea to protest against the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal".
					
					 It said that the participants in the candlelight actions have called for rapidly finishing the procedure of impeaching Park Geun Hye, immediately making a special investigation and realizing the institutional reform for change of society.
					
					 On the same day, the south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News carried a similar editorial warning that the candlelight action would continue until the people's demands are met.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Cambodia
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Cambodia
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian preparatory committee was formed on January 31 to celebrate the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star, birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On the instructions of King Norodom Sihamoni, Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and organize various political and cultural events on these occasions.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in UK
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in UK
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A British preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, was formed on January 24 in the joint name of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK.
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Iceland
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Iceland
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Reykjavik, Iceland on Jan. 23.
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday to be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday to be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea on January 30.
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize various political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il on this occasion.

articles.title: DPRK's Successes Introduced by Russian Magazine
articles.content:
DPRK's Successes Introduced by Russian Magazine
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Russia's online magazine Lemchich in an article titled "Major events of the DPRK in 2016" on Jan. 31 introduced the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK last year in the struggle to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and build a socialist power.
					 The magazine chose, as one of the major events, the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea at which respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was elected as the chairman of the WPK. The Congress was the most significant grand meeting as it marked a historic turning point in the sacred struggle to win the final victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche, it added.
					
					 It also listed as major events the successful first H-bomb test demonstrating Juche Korea's military capability for self-defense as well as the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4, test-fire of SLBM and nuclear warhead explosion test.
					
					 Besides, the events listed by the magazine include the completion of the Sci-Tech Complex, the proclamation of construction of Ryomyong Street, the completion of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3, the transformation of flood-hit northern areas in North Hamgyong Province into a socialist fairyland and the successful conclusion of the 200-day campaign of loyalty.

articles.title: Korean Youth's Faith and Courage Lauded by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Korean Youth's Faith and Courage Lauded by Nigerian Body
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article on Jan. 16.
					 The article said:
					
					 The Party's trust makes everything possible.
					
					 This is the firm faith and great courage of the Korean youths who have grown up to be warriors accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and creators of legendary tales about the heroic youth under the care of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu.
					
					 When visiting the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said there are many monumental edifices named after the youth in the DPRK and stressed that young people should always remember and glorify generation after generation the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il who trained them into the masters of the youth power.
					
					 And he highly appreciated the Korean youths, saying their strength is very great and the construction of the power station eloquently proved that they creditably play the role of vanguard in implementing every determination made by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The land is jolted by the dynamic footsteps of the Korean youths who are dashing ahead like the wind along the orbit of the Korean revolution with courage and faith that the Party's trust makes everything possible.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Maquinas de Precision de Kangdong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Maquinas de Precision de Kangdong
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas de Precision de Kangdong.
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recorrio el lugar de exhibicion de articulos, acondicionado nuevamente, el taller de procesamiento y otros lugares donde estudio detalladamente el estado de produccion actual y de la modernizacion y la calidad de los articulos.
					
					Expreso satisfaccion de que construyeron excelentemente el lugar de exhibicion de articulos donde expusieron varios articulos de buena apariencia, comodos y de alta eficiencia y subrayo que estan en el nivel mundial las tecnicas de procesamiento de maquinas de precision de la fabrica.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente recorrio tambien la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas, construida nuevamente.
					
					Operar con eficiencia la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas es un trabajo importante para materializar cabalmente la orientacion del Partido de formar a todos los ciudadanos como excelentes cientificos y tecnicos, dijo y agrego que los empleados deben normalizar la labor de adquirir los conocimientos de ciencias y tecnicas sofisticadas para mejorar incesantemente su nivel tecnico y habilidad y ampliar la vision, asi que deben prepararse como poseedores de las ciencias y tecnicas modernas.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente estuvo en la fabrica de procesamiento de soyas, el centro de servicio higienico de Ponghwa y las viviendas.
					
					Elogio el hecho de que se producen varios articulos procesados de sojas en las fabricas de brotes, cuajada y carne de soya.
					
					En el complejo de servicio higienico de Ponghwa que cuenta con el bano publico, piscina, barberia, peluqueria, salon de tenis de mesa, sala de curacion deportiva y el comedor, el Mariscal estuvo muy alegre diciendo que los empleados de la fabrica y sus familiares puedan gozar de una envidiable vida cultural.
					
					Se construyeron perfectamente las viviendas bien amuebladas, alabo y ordeno a hacer la mudanza con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente dijo que al recorrer la fabrica en pleno funcionamiento puede sentir bien el fervor de los obreros movilizados con la firme decision de producir mucho mas maquinas de precision de acuerdo con el proposito del Partido y presento las tareas que le incumben a la fabrica.
					
					Y se fotografio junto con los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron Jo Yong Won y Yu Jin, subjefes de departamento del Comite Central del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 5 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 75o aniversario del natalicio del eterno Dirigente Kim Jong Il, extiendo felicitaciones a usted y formulo votos por su salud, la felicidad de su familia y el mayor progreso y prosperidad del intimo pueblo coreano.

articles.title: MINFAP celebra el 8 de febrero
articles.content:
MINFAP celebra el 8 de febrero
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 el baile del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares para festejar el 69o aniversario del fortalecimiento y desarrollo del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea como las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Al iniciarse el baile con la cancion "!Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung!", los participantes danzaron recordando las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los militares danzaron a ritmo de las canciones "Cancion de orgullo de unidades guardias", "Soldados, seamos heroes", "Nos veremos en el frente", "Iremos al monte Paektu", etc.

articles.title: Tiene lugar encuentro de amistad con miembros de embajada china
articles.content:
Tiene lugar encuentro de amistad con miembros de embajada china
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo, la cancilleria coreana organizo el dia 7 un encuentro de amistad con los miembros de la embajada china en Corea.
					A la ocasion fueron invitados el embajador Li Jinjun y otros integrantes de la sede diplomatica.
					
					Hubo intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a que la amistad Corea-China deviene un valioso patrimonio, preparado y enriquecido por los lideres antecesores de ambos paises.
					
					Expresaron la voluntad de esforzarse en conjunto por intensificar y desarrollar sin cesar las relaciones bilaterales de amistad aun en medio de la complicada situacion internacional.

articles.title: Arma nuclear justiciera es mejor remedio frente a la misma opresora: comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Arma nuclear justiciera es mejor remedio frente a la misma opresora: comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Ya pasaron 59 anos desde cuando EE.UU. dio a la publicidad la introduccion de sus armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea. 
					El 29 de enero de 1958, EE.UU. publico oficialmente el emplazamiento del misil nuclear Honest John en el suelo surcoreano y en el mes siguiente, lo expuso a la vista del mundo. 
					
					Cerca de 60 anos desde entonces, se incremento gradualmente el numero de armas nucleares de EE.UU. colocadas en el Sur de Corea, especificamente, mas de mil en la decada de 1970 y mas de mil 720 en la decada de 1990. 
					
					Esos armamentos son los medios de agresion y de hegemonia de EE.UU. para aplastar a la RPDC y conquistar el mundo entero tomandola como trampolin. 
					
					Ya hace mucho tiempo, el imperio elaboro la politica de uso de arma nuclear cuando desate la segunda guerra coreana diciendo que "sufrio la derrota en la pasada guerra coreana por no haber usado la bomba atomica". 
					
					Segun ello, en julio de 1957, anuncio en publico el comienzo del armamento nuclear de sus tropas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y dio acicate al emplazamiento de armas nucleares en el frente avanzado, de modo que el suelo surcoreano se convirtiera en el mayor arsenal nuclear del Extremo Oriente. 
					
					EE.UU. fijo a la RPDC como blanco de ataque preventivo nuclear, complemento incesantemente con contenidos mas criminales los planes de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC, y al mismo tiempo, los ejercito constantemente a traves de las maniobras militares conjuntas con el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Recientemente, prometio con los titeres surcoreanos desarrollar en mayor envergadura de la historia los simulacros conjuntos anti-RPDC Key Resolve y Foal Eagle. 
					
					EE.UU. es el fautor de provocacion de la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC y el causante del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					La creciente campana de aplastamiento nuclear de EE.UU. empujo a la RPDC a tomar la ultima opcion de responder a las armas nucleares con las mismas y disponerse de la bomba H y otras ojivas nucleares minimizadas, aligeradas y diversificadas y de los medios de ataque estrategicos sofisticados. 
					
					Gracias a la posesion de armas nucleares por la RPDC, se ha disminuido considerablemente el peligro de estallido de la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y la era de amenaza nuclear unilateral de EE.UU. paso al tiempo en que las fuerzas hostiles ya no pueden dormir a piernas sueltas. 
					
					El pasado dia primero, fue sometido a la consideracion del Congreso norteamericano un informe que define a la RPDC como "pais mas cercano al primer lugar de la lista de pesadillas` para EE.UU." y que debido a la medida de ella para aumentar en gran medida sus fuerzas nucleares, "la administracion Trump enfrentara la situacion mas critica que no se ha visto en los ejecutivos antecesores". 
					
					La realidad comprueba que la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC es la opcion mas justa para salvar el destino del pais y nacion y defender la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region. 
					
					El mejor remedio para eliminar la amenaza nuclear anti-RPDC es la posesion del fuerte disuasivo nuclear. 
					
					Mientras EE.UU. y sus seguidores no dejen de ejercer la amenaza y chantaje nucleares sobre la RPDC ni de desarrollar los ejercicios de guerra nuclear con la excusa de que es una tradicion efectuarlos ano tras ano, la RPDC seguira fortaleciendo la capacidad de autodefensa nacional y de ataque preventivo centrada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					EE.UU. y la camarilla titere surcoreana deben actuar con prudencia conociendo bien a su rival y la corriente de la epoca.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena conflictivo acto verbal de Hong Yong Phyo
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena conflictivo acto verbal de Hong Yong Phyo
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- En el llamado "encuentro de los nostalgicos" efectuado hace unos dias en el Pabellon Rimjin, el ministro de Unificacion surcoreano Hong Yong Phyo acuso injustamente a la connacional RPDC hablando de la "solucion del problema de parientes y familiares separados" y anuncio que inducira la "desnuclearizacion" y el "cambio" del Norte en cooperacion con la sociedad internacional.
					Con anterioridad, en la reciente reunion plenaria del comite consultivo politico del Ministerio de Unificacion, Hong defendio la politica conflictiva anti-RPDC de la traidora Park Geun-hye y abogo por la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" diciendo que "es dificil resolver el problema de desnuclearizacion sin el cambio del Norte" y "hay que considerar el problema nuclear del Norte como asunto de unificacion".
					
					Tales disparates conflictivos devienen imperdonable locura antinacional y anti-reunificacion que sofoca la aspiracion nacional a mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur y abrir la ancha avenida de reunificacion independiente al abrir a toda costa la gran cita pannacional.
					
					Asi senala el rotativo Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					Las relaciones Norte-Sur cayeron en el peor estado de ruptura y quedo cerrada totalmente hasta la Zona Industrial de Kaesong.
					
					Esto se debe a las maniobras desesperadas de los compinches del Ministerio de Unificacion, incluyendo Hong, que se pusieron al frente de la campana de confrontacion fratricida segun la orden de Park Geun-hye quien creia los disparates absurdos de Choe Sun Sil de que "el Norte se derrumbara y se realizara la unificacion en 2017, a mas tardar en 2018".
					
					Hong debe esperar con Park la severa sentencia de la historia conociendo bien que su fiebre conflictiva le adelantara la autodestruccion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia el intento de Japon de resucitar el militarismo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia el intento de Japon de resucitar el militarismo
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- En la actualidad, se torna mas abierto el intento de Japon de resucitar el militarismo, revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					Ahora, Japon realiza con Gran Bretana la investigacion conjunta sobre el misil aire-aire de nuevo tipo para el caza por primera vez despues de la abolicion de las medidas de prohibicion de exportacion de armas. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, concerto con ese mismo pais europeo el convenio de apoyo reciproco de municiones y otros materiales belicos. Suscribio pactos semejantes con Estados Unidos y Australia y promueve el proyecto de renovarlos en virtud de la ley de seguridad. Y estan en marcha las negociaciones para hacer otro tanto con Canada y Francia. 
					
					Japon ya no es un "Estado pacifista". 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses estan vanagloriados de su capacidad economica y tecnologia de punta y enloquecidos por retomar el camino de agresion. 
					
					A instigacion de EE.UU., pueden enviar en cualquier momento sus fuerzas armadas a todas partes del mundo pretextando el ejercicio del "derecho a la defensa colectiva". 
					
					Ya se cambio la estrategia militar inicial de Japon, o sea, la de "defensa exclusiva" que limitaba el teatro operacional de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" al cielo y mar jurisdiccionales del pais. 
					
					Segun la enmendada "guia de cooperacion en defensa Japon-EE.UU.", se extiende a todo el mundo la dimension operacional de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa". 
					
					Bajo el amparo de EE.UU., los reaccionarios japoneses pueden incorporarse abiertamente a las guerras de agresion para la hegemonia mundial liberandose de las trabas impuestas al pais derrotado en la segunda guerra mundial. 
					
					Ellos deben darse cuenta de que el desenlace final de sus maniobras militaristas es la autodestruccion.
